title: Looking For Duo Partner Silver! To Climb to gold and perhaps further.
body: Hey been in bronze for 2 months finally got to silver about 4 days ago and I am already silver 4 finding it a lot easy to climb still looking for a duo tho. I comfortably main Mid as Viktor/ Ahri/ Fizz and I main Support as/ Leona/ Thresh/ Morgana/ Malphite. I also Main ADC as Kalista and can play Sivir and Jinx. I can play all roles and it doesn't bother me what I play. I am on quite a lot and I expect to be doing ranked most of the time I don't mind norms tho if learning a new champion for ranked. If we play a game and you not satisfied with me no hard feelings feel free to leave I hold no grudges. Let me know thanks :)  oh and Add I Smiley I

replies.body:
you forgot to mention your ingame name.

Note: I have checked, its not 'RxipeQjZrB'
I'm keen, add me In game: macbethsex69
You'll find more success finding a partner in the 'Team Recruitment' section.
